structure.unit: Crimes, Punishments And Proceedingsin Criminal Cases

law.catch_line: Fraudulent Use Of Labor Union Seal, Trademark Or Insignia
law.text: Whoever knowingly and fraudulently displays or otherwise uses, in any manner whatsoever, the seal, trademark or insignia of any labor organization as defined by subsection (5) of section two of chapter one hundred and fifty A shall be punished by a fine of not more than one thousand dollars.
